## Type

- [ ] `feat` — New feature
- [ ] `fix` — Bug fix
- [ ] `refactor` — Code restructuring (no new feature, no bug fix)
- [ ] `docs` — Documentation only
- [ ] `test` — Tests only
- [ ] `chore` — Tooling, dependencies, config

## Checklist

- [ ] `npm run type-check` passes in `web/`
- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds
- [ ] New/updated tests cover the change (if applicable)
- [ ] No `any` types introduced without justification
- [ ] Commit messages follow [Conventional Commits](/.github/COMMIT_CONVENTION.md)
